q1.question: How does the conversion work?
q1.answer: The conversion happens on our secure, German GDPR-compliant servers using state-of-the-art technology. Your files are automatically deleted after conversion.

q2.question: Which formats are supported?
q2.answer: We support all common audio formats like WAV, FLAC, OGG, M4A, AAC and many more. Output is delivered as high-quality MP3 files.

q3.question: Are there file size limits?
q3.answer: The maximum file size depends on your available memory. Generally, files up to 100MB can be processed without issues.

q4.question: Is it really free to use?
q4.answer: Yes, our MP3 converter is completely free. There are no hidden costs or premium features.

q5.question: Are my files stored?
q5.answer: No, all files are only processed temporarily on our German servers and automatically deleted immediately after conversion.
